title: far from center but quiet. easy bus transport & close tasty Arenchini. got what u need
text: recommanded for independent people who can manage by host lives in another place. parking place free neer the block. its in the second ot 3rd floor. kitchen available for self making. easy to buy supermarket near by & prepare what u want. good host.

title: good place excellent service & politenss, close to Como Leco lakes
text: if I go to the lakes again - I might go there again....combination of all parameters is great. good food. hospitality. avaialbility. service attitude. willing to help. felxibility. very close to the wonderfull lakes

title: close place for the troly. enough tiolets. snacks to eat. very polite team. smooth flight

title: very tasty unic Pizza. ask for the sicilian one...:)
text: lot of parking place. just in the nature. very tasty reach pizza. excellent service. u can order different pizza each time. also take away.

title: very good food, excellent service, in a stone house & street full of stories
text: when coming to Metulla, walking in the main street - 5-10 minutes - come to eat in a farm resturant in which much is hme made. also good hotel same place. lot of History stories from the owner if he is there. from 1880.

title: very tasty excellent service. for salty stuff - come early. ends quickly.
text: besides very good patisseri, prefered pinat butter & Chokolate, the coffee & the tea is first class. if u need it to yr throat - ask for ginger honey & lemon. for seating - make a reservation.

title: good place to celebrate family events. tasty food. not cheap. excellent service.
text: we used to celebrate here all the birthdays of the family. 5-22 people. order in advance. good Fukatcha. can make yr stomach full.

title: we like it here. we eat here a lot. Italian food. good service.
text: a lot of parking place. u can also order Piza to take away. u can always order something else - & it will be another taste.

title: if u like Piza - thats the place. also take away. good service.
text: u have also that double level stuff that one slice can make yr stomach full. "Kalazune". good place to flater to yrself

title: good tatsty bread & cookies....buy & take away. excellent service

title: here u have a little of everything. shops of evrything. recommanded.

title: the first dozes can feel yr stomach.

text: if u r in K8 u must eat here. dont miss it. ask for the Tali tray & Panir & Batata Warra & Chai Mhasala & if u like spicy ask for Chatni. dont forget to take a selfi with Kalu baba

title: I'm going underground....a must b & c place...feel the secrets hidden under the west wall
text: stepping there u can feel the holly spirit & our predecessors & the kinks all together...its good for the soil & the mental & the body excited from steping there.

title: a must b & c & take a pics place up there....from all angels...its another aspect. u can play with yr camera. its a chal
text: if u come in the morning & or in the sunset - it makes it different pics if u like taking photoes. dont come middle day its crowded. gring good shoes as u might slide on the rocks.

title: a must b & c place to fill the mood the spirit & the energies of the Jewish predecessors. mixed energies. come open mind
text: when u stand there u can feel the high level of spirit, mental, mood....the energies r mixed. good view. happiness & sadness same time.

title: a must b & c place. u can climb it or take the tram. up & or down. highly recommanded during sun set
text: a most recommanded place to b & c . perfect if u come with yr beloved one to kiss during sunset. u can laso yell as a fox up there....

title: a must b & c place if u want to understand whats important in life & what can be done if the good sits quiet during bad
text: a place that makes u consider whats Major & whats Minor in life...a good place to make a "status" thinking f yr life. from here u can only improve yr life & understand u r here to find yr additional value & do something that remains after u
place: Yad Vashem - The World Holocaust Remembrance Center

title: a must be & c place. narrow roads between the mountains. very close to Jerusalem. good place to walk & eat & drink.
text: if u come in the spring it makes it perfect as everything is blossom. landscape is unic. if u come to Jerusalem - take it from here. narrow entrance but worth every minute.

title: its on the way to the acropolice...can be bought in a combined ticket....pitty its not fully reconstraucted

title: amazing place to b & c but too crowded....plz come early

title: a very good place to seat & rest & view the landscape. good energies

title: a must b & c place as its in Jerusalem - # 1 unic heterogenic city for all religions
text: its highly recommanded to visit this quarter & the others in Jerusalem. if u come u can feel the spiritual energies

title: usefull & efficient . watch yr bag & look in advance for the Zones needed. buy 10 single jouneys
text: the metro takes u always anywhere. take in consideration when u go out from A1 Zone u have to change metro line. all of them have maps but the old ones no voice of station reached. watch yr pockets & bags

title: just come hungrey & order minimum 2 things...enjoy
text: good food good service price OK. remember to come hungrey. u dont have to come all in. one can buy to the others witing outside...as sometimes its realy crowded

title: a must b & c place. dont miss it! come hungrey.... recommanded every day....:)
text: we were so pleased with the food so we came a day after day....its crouded so u have to plan yr eating visit in non rush hours. the food is excelent. u have everything. just choose or eat all....clean place. watch yr pockets & bags. toilets down floor. available by walking from metro.

title: its just there when u come to the lake...good place to rest
text: when u walk over the huge Madrid national park, u reach the place. its recommanded to stop in one of the bar caffee nearby, watch the monumento & the lake & the all kind of people passing by.

title: u pass it when u go in the huge national park of Madrid
text: u reach it in your healthy walking through the park. its just on your way. few minutes & u r done & continue yr way.

title: good transportation to & from the airport incl T4S intl.
text: many ways to come to the airport. taxi, bus, metro. depends on rush hours & budget. prices are OK. in the airport there is an internal train that takes u to the T4S. there is thinking about the people when they planned the availability. inpressive.

title: moderate. intersting but the guard won't let u come realy close
text: the fact that the guard keeps u out to become near is disappointing. photoes can be taken from distance, so it makes it so so.

title: one of the must b & c places in Madrid.lot of shops any kind

title: recommanded street to walk through step by stores. watch yr pockets

title: impresive but hard to enter. need to list in advance. long waiting. rough team photoes forbidden
text: if u want free enter - with yr European passport - come abt 15:30, they open doors abt 16:00, u enter abt 17:00, so u have one hour. no bags. no photoes. at the end they push u put passivley. inpressive but really hard to enter.

title: waiste of time & money
text: negative energies from most of the pics, no photoes alowed. recommanded not to go there. save yr money & time
